pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tool-Box of Chain Ladder Plus Models // Implementation of the ageperiodcohort models for claim development presented in Pittarello G, Hiabu M, Villegas A (2025) Replicating and Extending ChainLadder via an AgePeriodCohort Structure on the Claim Development in a RunOff Triangle doi:10.1080/10920277.2025.2496725.
